wikitext.*:
Here listed are the ''major'' one-volume '''UK editions''' of '''''[[The Lord of the Rings]]'''''.

==1968-1989==
<gallery mode="traditional" widths="125px" heights="125px">
File:The Lord of the Rings OV 1968.gif|1968 paperback
File:The Lord of the Rings OV 1972.gif|1968 paperback 11th impression
File:The Lord of the Rings OV 1973.gif|1968 paperback 12th impression
File:The Lord of the Rings OV 1969.gif|1969 hardcover deluxe edition
File:The Lord of the Rings OV 1978.gif|1978 paperback
File:The Lord of the Rings OV 1979.gif|1978 paperback film tie-in
File:The Lord of the Rings OV 1983.gif|1983 paperback
File:The Lord of the Rings OV 1987.gif|1983 paperback 8th impression
File:The Lord of the Rings OV 1989.gif|1983 paperback 12th impression
File:The Lord of the Rings OV 1988.gif|1988 hardcover
</gallery>
* [[1968]]: [[George Allen & Unwin]], paperback, ISBN 0048230871 - (first 1-vol edition, cover art by [[Pauline Baynes]])
** 1968 paperback edition, 11th impression ([[1972]])
** 1968 paperback edition, 12th impression ([[1973]])
* [[1969]]: [[George Allen & Unwin]], hardcover in slipcase/box, ISBN 004823091X - (deluxe India paper edition)
* [[1978]]: [[Unwin Paperbacks]], paperback, ISBN 0048231495 - (second 1-vol edition)
** 1978 paperback edition, [[The Lord of the Rings (1978 film)|1978 film]] tie-in edition - (cover from the film)
* [[1983]]: Unicorn / Unwin Paperbacks, paperback, ISBN 0048232297 - (third 1-vol edition, cover art by [[Roger Garland]])
** 1983 paperback edition, 8th impression ([[1987]])
** 1983 paperback edition, 12th impression ([[1989]])
* [[1988]]: [[Unwin Hyman]], hardcover, ISBN 0044403054

==1990-1999==
<gallery mode="traditional" widths="125px" heights="125px">
File:The Lord of the Rings OV 1991-white.gif|1991 hardcover illust. by A. L.
File:The Lord of the Rings OV 1991-black.gif|1991 hardcover 11th impression
File:The Lord of the Rings OV 1991-del.gif|1991 hardcover illust. by A. L. deluxe edition
File:The Lord of the Rings OV 1991hb-1994-1-hb.gif|1991 & 1994 hardcover
File:The Lord of the Rings OV 1994-9-hb.gif|1994 hardcover 9th impression
File:The Lord of the Rings OV 1993pb-1995-1-pb.gif|1993 & 1995 paperback
File:The Lord of the Rings OV 1995-11-pb.gif|1995 paperback 11th impression
File:The Lord of the Rings OV 1995-16-pb.gif|1995 paperback 16th impression
File:The Lord of the Rings OV 1995-30-pb.gif|1995 paperback 30th impression
File:The Lord of the Rings OV 1997.gif|1997 hardcover deluxe edition
</gallery>
* [[1991]]: [[HarperCollins]] hardcover, ISBN 0261102303 - (illustrated by [[Alan Lee]])
** 1991: illustrated hardcover edition, 11th impression
** 1991: illustrated deluxe hardcover edition, ISBN 0261102745
* [[1991]]: [[HarperCollins]] hardcover, ISBN 0261102419 - (cover art by [[John Howe]])
* [[1994]]: [[HarperCollins]] hardcover, ISBN 0261103202
** 1994 hardcover edition, 9th impression
* [[1993]]: [[HarperCollins]] paperback, ISBN 0261102435
* [[1995]]: [[HarperCollins]] paperback, ISBN 0261103253
** 1995 paperback edition, 11th impression
** 1995 paperback edition, 16th impression - (special limited edition, ISBN 0007118368)
** 1995 paperback edition, 30th impression
* [[1997]]: [[HarperCollins]] hardcover in slipcase, ISBN 0261103687 - (deluxe India paper edition)

==2000-2009==
<gallery mode="traditional" widths="125px" heights="125px">
File:The Lord of the Rings OV 2001-film.gif|2001 paperback film tie-in
File:The Lord of the Rings OV 2002-hb.gif|2002 hardcover film tie-in
File:The Lord of the Rings OV 2002-film.gif|2002 paperback film tie-in
File:The Lord of the Rings OV 2003-film.gif|2003 paperback film tie-in
File:The Lord of the Rings OV 2003-little.gif|2003 paperback mini edition
File:The Lord of the Rings OV 2004-hb.jpeg|2004 hardcover
File:The Lord of the Rings OV 2004-del.jpeg|2004 hardcover deluxe edition
File:The Lord of the Rings OV 2005-pb.gif|2005 paperback
File:The Lord of the Rings OV 2007.jpeg|2007 paperback
</gallery>
* [[2001]]: [[HarperCollins]] paperback, ISBN 0007123817 - ([[The Lord of the Rings: The Fellowship of the Ring|film I]] tie-in edition, cover from the film)
* [[2002]]: [[HarperCollins]] hardcover, ISBN 0007149131 - (film tie-in edition, cover from the film)
* [[2002]]: [[HarperCollins]] paperback, ISBN 0007149247 - ([[The Lord of the Rings: The Two Towers|film II]] tie-in edition, cover from the film)
* [[2003]]: [[HarperCollins]] paperback, ISBN 0007172001 - ([[The Lord of the Rings: The Return of the King|film III]] tie-in edition, cover from the film)
* [[2003]]: HarperCollins / W.H. Smith, paperback, ISBN 0007172745 - (mini edition containing only Chapter One)
* [[2004]]: 1994 hardcover edition, reset in 2004 - ('''50th Anniversary edition''')
* [[2004]]: [[HarperCollins]] hardcover in slipcase, ISBN 0007182368 - (50th Anniversary deluxe edition)
** [[2005]]: 1995 paperback edition, ?th impression - (50th Anniversary paperback edition)
** [[2007]]: 1995 paperback edition, 40th impression

==2010-Present==
<gallery mode="traditional" widths="125px" heights="125px">
File:The Lord of the Rings OV 2014-hb.jpeg|2014 hardcover illust. by A. L.
File:The Lord of the Rings OV 2021-hb.jpeg|2021 hardcover illust. by author
File:The Lord of the Rings OV 2021-del.jpeg|2021 hardcover illust. by author deluxe edition
File:The Lord of the Rings OV 2022-pb.jpeg|2022 paperback TV tie-in
File:The Lord of the Rings OV 2022-pb-2.jpg|2022 paperback
</gallery>
* [[2014]]: [[HarperCollins]] hardcover in slipcase, ISBN 0007525540 - (illustrated by [[Alan Lee]])
* [[2021]]: [[HarperCollins]] hardcover, ISBN 0008471282 - (illustrated by the [[J.R.R. Tolkien|author]])
* [[2021]]: [[HarperCollins]] hardcover in slipcase, ISBN 0008471290 - (illustrated by the author)
** [[2022]]: 1995 paperback edition, 67th impression,<ref name="note">The same impression is issued in two different covers, the Rings of Power one is assigned a distinct ISBN.</ref> ISBN 0008537763 - ([[The Lord of the Rings: The Rings of Power|Amazon TV]] tie-in edition, cover from the show)
** [[2022]]: 1995 paperback edition, 67th impression<ref name="note" />
